titleStmt.title: To the honourable the Commons assembled in Parliament, the humble petition of divers free-borne English-men, inhabiting in the cities of London and Westminster, the burrough of Southwark, hamblets, and places adjacent.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy (E.612[1]): "1st Sep London 1650"; "this ye Levellers petion".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
